panels.title: What is the average daily amount of...

targets.rawSql:
select
  creation_date::date as time,
  sum(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (end_date - start_date))) as "Time in Bed"
from hk_category_record 
where 
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKCategoryTypeIdentifierSleepAnalysis'
AND 
  hk_value = 'HKCategoryValueSleepAnalysisInBed'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_date, '1d', NULL),
  sum(hk_value) as "Stand Time"
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierAppleStandTime'
AND
  hk_source = 'Nathaniel’s Apple Watch'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_date, '1d', NULL),
  sum(hk_value) as "Exercise Time"
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierAppleExerciseTime'
AND
  hk_source = 'Nathaniel’s Apple Watch'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_date, '1d', NULL),
  sum(hk_value) as "Resting"
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierBasalEnergyBurned'
AND
  hk_source = 'Nathaniel’s Apple Watch'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_date, '1d', NULL),
  sum(hk_value) as "Active"
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierActiveEnergyBurned'
AND
  hk_source = 'Nathaniel’s Apple Watch'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

select
  creation_date::date as time,
  sum(hk_value) as "Steps"
from hk_quantity_record 
where 
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierStepCount'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

select
  creation_date::date as time,
  sum(hk_value) as "Flights Climbed"
from hk_quantity_record 
where 
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierFlightsClimbed'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

select
  creation_date::date as time,
  sum(hk_value) as "Distance"
from hk_quantity_record 
where 
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierDistanceWalkingRunning'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

select
  creation_date::date as time,
  sum(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (end_date - start_date))) as "Time in Bed"
from hk_category_record 
where 
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKCategoryTypeIdentifierSleepAnalysis'
AND 
  hk_value = 'HKCategoryValueSleepAnalysisInBed'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: How much time do I spend in bed each day?

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_date, '1d', NULL),
  sum(hk_value) as "Stand Time"
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierAppleStandTime'
AND
  hk_source = 'Nathaniel’s Apple Watch'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: How many calories do I use per day?

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_date, '1d', 0),
  sum(hk_value) as "Steps Per Day"
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierStepCount'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: How many steps per day were taken?

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_date, '1d', 0),
  sum(hk_value) as "Flights Climbed per Day"
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierFlightsClimbed'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: How many flights of stairs were climbed per day?

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_date, '1d', 0),
  sum(hk_value) as "Miles per Day"
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierDistanceWalkingRunning'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: How far do I walk/run each day?

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_date, '1h', -1),
  CASE
    WHEN hk_value = 'HKCategoryValueAppleStandHourStood' THEN 1
    WHEN hk_value = 'HKCategoryValueAppleStandHourIdle' THEN 0
  END as "Standing Status"
from hk_category_record 
where 
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKCategoryTypeIdentifierAppleStandHour'
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  start_date as time,
  hk_value as "Body Mass"
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierBodyMass'
ORDER BY time

ORDER BY time

WHERE

AND

ORDER BY time

AND

SELECT

panels.title: How fast do I travel on stairs?

list.definition:
SELECT distinct(hk_source)
FROM hk_quantity_record
UNION
SELECT distinct(hk_source)
FROM hk_category_record
ORDER BY hk_source
list.description: The source/device the data came from.
list.label: source
list.name: source
list.query:
SELECT distinct(hk_source)
FROM hk_quantity_record
UNION
SELECT distinct(hk_source)
FROM hk_category_record
ORDER BY hk_source
